abstract: Indian court acquits Bollywood star Salman Khan of all charges in 2012 hit-and-run case that left one person dead and four others injured.
lead_paragraph: A court in Mumbai overturned an earlier conviction and five-year sentence over allegations that the actor was driving drunk when he ran over five homeless men.

headline.main: Salman Khan, Bollywood Star, Wins Appeal in Hit-and-Run Case
headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Asia; India: Court Acquits a Bollywood Star

snippet: A court in Mumbai overturned an earlier conviction and five-year sentence over allegations that the actor was driving drunk when he ran over five homeless men.
